text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: So, Agnes Tachyon… are you prepared?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Just say the word, Ms. President.

Agnes Tachyon. The culmination of generations of the finest 
breeding and training. She may be rebellious, but there's no 
denying her pure speed.

Against Symboli Rudolph. The emperor. An extraordinary talent, 
the pinnacle of the academy's hierarchy.

I was about to witness a clash between two unstoppable forces. 
From the moment they exploded from the start line, the 
atmosphere was transformed, the air crackling with electricity.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hah, haa…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Heh… They don't call her the Emperor for nothing…

Neither held back an ounce of strength, but Symboli 
Rudolph opened an early gap, a gap which stretched, 
inexorably, inch by inch…

Until… at the top of the home straight, 
Tachyon made her move…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
(The existence of particles that can move faster 
than light without violating special relativity 
has yet to be conclusively disproven…)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
(And while conventional wisdom says that the physiological limit 
to a horsegirl's speed is about 70 km/h… it has never been 
conclusively proven that we too cannot go even faster!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
(Can't you see? The potential! In these legs…! In this 
body…! They overflow with possibilities yet unknown!!)
At that moment, something changed in Agnes Tachyon's eyes…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Kuh…!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Faster… faster…!! FASTER!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
The untapped power that sleeps in the horsegirl 
body… The true outer limits of speed…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
We have yet to see the barest shadow of what 
lies beyond the veil of our understanding!

Her eyes radiated the innocence of a young girl, yet also the 
madness of an infernal being possessed by its desires—
A sight so enchanting my breath ceased for a moment.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Haa… heh… fuu…!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm exhausted! Really, you gave me 
quite a workout, Agnes Tachyon!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Heh… really, you're too kind. After all, you won in the end.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Only by a nose… if that. The things you could be capable of…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
To think we're going to have to let you go. It'll be a terrible 
loss. I suppose you still have your heart set on leaving?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ms. President, surely you're not trying to appeal to my sense of 
loyalty to the academy? If so, then I'm afraid you're wasting 
your time. My mind is quite made up.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I see… And I suppose there's no point in asking 
the opinion of your friend here…?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I see… And I suppose there's no point in asking 
the opinion of your friend here…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hm? Him…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hm? Her…?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …heh.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ah… you. What's that face for?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: You're looking a little… off-color…
I couldn't stop thinking about the performance I'd just seen…

And if she was right, about the "untapped power of the Uma 
Musume body"… that would mean she could go faster still…
Faster… faster!!!
choice_data_list:
(I want to see it… I too want to see 
what lies beyond our understanding!)

(I want to see it… I too want to see 
what lies beyond our understanding!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hey! Idiot! What are you gawping at?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, please. You're not going to ask to be my trainer 
or something are you? Give me a break. I have no 
intention of delaying my work any further.

Of course, Agnes Tachyon wasn't looking for a trainer. For her, 
training is nothing more than one element of her research.
But if that's the case…
choice_data_list: Do you still have that serum from before?
Do you still have that serum from before?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: What are you going on about? Yes, but…

She pulled out three vials of mysterious liquid, each a more 
troubling color than the last. I grabbed them and…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: H… hey! What are you…
And downed all three!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Well I'll be…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Well how do you like that! Haaahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I've never seen anyone so eager to subject themselves 
to testing! You truly are a born guinea pig!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: —Hmm?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You do say some amusing things, don't you? Are 
you sure you want to be my lab rat? To relinquish 
your human rights in the name of science?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Tell me, what has brought on this sudden change of heart?
choice_data_list:
I want to see it too. I want to see what lies 
beyond the veil of our understanding!

I want to see it too. I want to see what lies 
beyond the veil of our understanding!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hmmmmmmmmm…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I've heard those words before… but not quite like this…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Then it's decided! Come with me.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Do try to keep up. To the staff room, of course! 
Now that I have my trainer, we can put an end 
to this talk of leaving the academy…
choice_data_list: So… I can be your trainer?!
So… I can be your trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Your position will be that of "guinea pig"… or maybe a step 
below that… If you're happy with that, then come with me.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Come with me… and I will show you things 
none have dared to dream possible…
And so began our research…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm… hold on. We should probably wait for your 
symptoms to subside first. Better to avoid any unnecessary 
confusion and misunderstanding.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Haven't you noticed? You're luminescing! A beautiful lime green!
